name: Zeus
description: God of thunder, King of Gods and Master of Olympus

name: Poseidon
description: God of the sea, earthquakes, and horses

name: Hades
description: God of the underworld and the dead

name: Apollo
description: Goddess of wisdom, war, and strategy

name: Athena
description: A god that can conceal itself by changing its appearance

name: Hermes
description: God of trade, thieves, and messenger of the gods

name: Demeter
description: Goddess of agriculture and the harvest

name: Artemis
description: Goddess of the hunt, wilderness, and childbirth
